subject: RTSC Talk Show Sunday April 11th at 6pm est.--(Mark and Debbie Constantino)
author: Urkel23
full_text:
A great show is scheduled for Sunday, Mark and Debbie Constantino will be our
guests. You have probably seen them on several shows including Ghost
Adventures, Paranormal State....just to name a couple.

They are EVP specialists in the field and should be a great show to check out,
so i hope you do.

Here is their site:

http://www.spirits-speak.com

Here is how to listen and chat come Sunday at 6pm.

http://www.stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html

My call in number is 732-587-7041 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting              732-587-7041      end_of_the_skype_highlighting

I posted this a little early, so people who schedule weekend events might be
able to come back in time to tune in. Remember, i'm now on the all new "Steve
Hultay Radio Network".....yeah, i still haven't come up with anything more
catchy yet.

See ya there,
-Steve H
